item.description:
Dreamwork often includes psychic experiences and the development of psychic skills, including communicating with spirit guides, having visions and premonitions, and tuning into what's really going on with friends and loved ones. In this Meetup we will feature two professional psychics to answer questions about your own experiences and practices.  Our experts will teach us about the different kinds of ESP, such as mediumship versus psychic intuition, and the different ways to get information (the four clairs: clairaudience, clairvoyance, clairsentience, claircognizance). You'll get tips for how to distinguish types of paranormal dreams and what to do with them, as well as advice for building your psychic abilities. Join us with your questions or comments on visions, clairvoyance, remote viewing, out of body experiences, premonitions, psychic healing, telepathy, and more!

Lea Hill is an intuitive medium who offers readings for those seeking guidance and comfort from the world of Spirit. She is a master level Reiki practitioner and a Certified Angel Healing Practitioner©. She hosts The Spirit Connection radio show & co-hosts Angels Lighthouse on TV3 in Medford. She has also written a young adults fantasy novel about sylphs and a non-verbal autistic boy. Her website is:   http://www.LeaMHill.com

Mark Levin has been a healer since 1990. He is a Reiki Master, Certified Hypnotherapist, gifted medical intuitive and has also mastered and practiced many somewhat less popular healing modalities. As a researcher, teacher and scientist, Mark is constantly developing new and more effective ways to facilitate healing. Most recently, he has discovered Transcendental Healing, a non-invasive, non-contact method to facilitate resonance fields. He offers classes and workshops teaching this method. His website is:  http://www.TranscendentalHealing.com

Payment is $10 and can be made online or in person. Anyone who cannot afford to pay is encouraged to attend anyway and should contact the group organizer Deerheart before attending.

Event will be from 7 pm until 9 pm. RSVP requested. Please update your RSVP if you are unable to attend. Thank you.

For directions and other information about location please visit the Cambridge Swedenborg Chapel website.
item.how_to_find_us: Side entrance by the parking lot, turn left up stairs, turn right through doorway, into the chapel.
item.name: Dreams and Psychic Skills
